title: Reminders
description: Reminders are prompts that need to be run more or less all the time to inform the frustratingly limited context window.

title: Prompts
description: Prompts are instructions for a task at hand. Some come up often, some are one-and-done.

title: Specifications
description: Specifications are comprehensive documentation that covers an interrelated set of code. They go through cycles of revision and use.
